name: 霧子
text: ふふ……できた……♪
trans: Fufu... It's done...♪

name: 咲耶
text: おはようございます……おや？
trans: Good morning... Oh?

name: 霧子
text:
あ、咲耶さん……
おはよう……
trans:
Ah, Sakuya...
Good morning...

name: 咲耶
text:
おはよう、霧子
一生懸命、何を作っているんだい？
trans:
Morning, Kiriko.
What is that you're making so diligently?

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
てるてる坊主……
trans:
Yes...
It's a Teru Teru Bozu...

name: 霧子
text:
ずっと降ってるから……
早く……太陽さんに会えますようにって……
trans:
Since it's been raining non stop...
It's to... wish for us to be able to see the sun soon...

name: 咲耶
text:
へえ。可愛いらしいてるてる坊主だね
空だけでなく、心の中まで明るくなりそうだよ
trans:
I see. It sure is a cute Teru Teru Bozu. Not only does it clear up the sky,
I can feel my heart clearing up as well.

name: 霧子
text: ……ふふ……よかった♪
trans: ...Fufu... Then that's good♪

name: 霧子
text:
あ……はづきさんから、伝言あったの……
あの、あっちの机の上にね……
trans:
Ah... you have a message from Hazuki...
Umm, see, on the desk over there...

name: 咲耶
text:
なんだろうか……
……えっ、これは……
trans:
What might it be...
...Eh, this is...

name: 咲耶
text: （……私の傘？　でも、この傘は……）
trans: (...By umbrella? But this umbrella is...)

name: 霧子
text:
さっき……
はづきさんが、置いていったの……
trans:
Just now...
Hazuki left it there...

name: 咲耶
text: どうして、はづきさんが……？
trans: Why does Hazuki have this...?

name: 霧子
text:
わからないけど……
お手紙も……置いていったよ……
trans:
I don't know...
But she also... left a letter...

name: 咲耶
text: 手紙……ああ、これだね。どれどれ……
trans: A letter... ah, must be this one. Let's see...

name: 咲耶
text: フフ……そうか……
trans: Heh... I see...

name: 霧子
text: なんて……書いてあったの……？
trans: What does... it say...?

name: 咲耶
text:
……実はこの傘、
通りすがりに人に譲っていたんだ
trans:
...Actually, this umbrella,
I gave it away to a passerby.

name: 咲耶
text:
その人が、私の顔に見覚えがあったようでね
わざわざ調べて、事務所まで届けに来てくれたそうだよ
trans: Apparently, that person found my face familiar, and went out of her way to find the office and even came here to return my umbrella.

name: 霧子
text:
わぁ……そうなんだ……！
……咲耶さん、良かったね……
trans:
Wow... Is that so...?
...Sakuya, I'm so happy for you...

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ。それに、どうやら今回の件で
その人が私のファンになってくれたらしいんだ
trans: Yea. Also, thanks to this incident that person seems to have become my fan.

name: 咲耶
text:
こうして私のことを知ってもらえた上に
応援もしてもらえるなんて……
trans:
To have her learn more about me
and even come to support me...

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……私はしたいことをしただけなのに、
こんな嬉しいお返しが貰えるなんてね
trans: Heh... I only did what I wanted to do, who knew I'd get something so wonderful in return.

name: 結華
text:
おはようございまーす
いやぁ、雨の日が続くねぇ
trans:
Good morning!
Phew, the rain just doesn't let up.

name: 摩美々
text:
おはよーございまぁす
あれー？　咲耶、その手紙はぁ？
trans:
Good morning... Huh?
Sakuya, what's with that letter?

name: 結華
text:
お、ほんとだ。どしたの？
ずいぶん嬉しそうだけど
trans:
Oh, you're right. What's up?
You look really happy.

name: 咲耶
text: フフ。ちょっと、いいことがあってね
trans: Heh. Something nice happened.

name: 恋鐘
text:
おっはよー！
わあ！　霧子、それてるてる坊主？
trans:
Mornin'! Wow!
Kiriko, that a Teru Teru Bozu?

name: 霧子
text:
うん……
早く……お空が晴れますようにって……
trans:
Yes... It's to...
wish for the sky to be clear soon...

name: 恋鐘
text:
ばり可愛か！
霧子、うちもてるてる坊主作りたかばい！
trans:
It's real cute!
Kiriko, I wanna try makin' a Teru Teru Bozu too!

name: 霧子
text: うん……一緒に、作ろう……♪
trans: Then... let's make them together...♪

name: 結華
text:
みんなが作るなら三峰も作ろっかなー
まみみんもどう？
trans: Since everyone's making one, then maybe Mitsumine should too! How about you, Mamimin?

name: 摩美々
text:
えー……
私は別に……
trans:
Eh...
I don't particularly...

name: 恋鐘
text:
せっかくだから、みんなで作ればよかったい！
ほら、咲耶もこっちに来んね！
trans:
Since everyone's makin',
you might as well! You too Sakuya, c'mere!

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ。みんなで作った方が
雨も早く上がるかもしれないね
trans: Heh. Maybe the rain will let up earlier with everyone making one.

name: 恋鐘
text: あ、結華、その紫のペン、次貸してくれん？
trans: Ah, Yuika, can you lend me that purple pen next?

name: 結華
text:
おっけー。……はいどうぞーって、おお！
それ、こがたん的にはまみみんのつもりな感じ？
trans:
Okay... Here you go!
Woah! Kogatan, is that meant to be like Mamimi?

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふっふっふー。よう気づいたね！
そうばい、これは正真正銘、摩美々のてるてる坊主たい！
trans:
Heh heh heh! Good job noticin'!
That's right, this is indeed Mamimi's Teru Teru Bozu!

name: 摩美々
text:
どれどれー
…………これ、似てるー？
trans:
Let's have a look.
...Is this supposed to resemble me?

name: 恋鐘
text:
んふふー。そっくりたい！
摩美々に似て、ばり可愛いてるてる坊主やけんね！
trans:
Ufufu! The resemblance is uncanny!
It looks like Mamimi, it's a real cute Teru Teru Bozu!

name: 摩美々
text: ふーん……じゃあ、私は恋鐘をモデルにしよっかなぁ
trans: Hmm... Then, maybe I'll use Kogane as my model as well.

name: 結華
text:
じゃあ三峰はさくやん担当ね！
キリッとした美人につーくろ！
trans: Then Mitsumine will be in charge of Sakuyan! Mitsumine will make it a smart looking beauty!

name: 霧子
text:
わたしは……結華ちゃんのてるてる坊主……
きっと……お日様を連れてきてくれるから……
trans:
Then I'll... make Yuika's Teru Teru Bozu...
It'll definitely... be able to bring the sun back...

name: 咲耶
text:
それじゃあ、私は霧子のてるてる坊主だね
包帯を少し巻いて……うん。上手くできた
trans:
Then mine will be Kiriko's Teru Teru Bozu.
I'll wrap it in some bandage... yea, it looks good.

name: 恋鐘
text:
できたー！　うちらのてるてる坊主！
早速飾るばい！
trans:
All done!
Our own Teru Teru Bozu! Let's put it up now!

name: 結華
text:
よーし……ってアレ？　雨止んでるや
夢中になってて気づかなかったなー……
trans:
Alriiight... huh? The rain has let up!
We were so engrossed we didn't even notice!

name: 結華
text:
って、あー！
みんな、窓の外、見て見て！
trans:
Wait, ah!
Everyone, take a look out the window!

name: 摩美々
text:
大きな声出して何ー？
……あ
trans:
What's the matter, raising your voice like that?
...Ah.

name: 霧子
trans: Wow... a rainbow...!

name: 恋鐘
text:
ばりキレイやねー！
これも、うちらのてるてる坊主のおかげたい！
trans:
It sure is pretty!
This is also thanks to our Teru Teru Bozu!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ。とても綺麗だね
空と地上を繋ぐ架け橋……
trans:
Yea. It sure is pretty,
the bridge that connects the skies and the ground...

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、雨が続くと思っていたのに、
こんなに美しい光景をみんなと一緒に見られるなんてね
trans: Heh. And here I thought that the rain would continue, who would've thought that I would able to see such a beautiful sight with everyone.

name: 結華
text:
三峰たちがみんなで虹を見れるように
雨が降っててくれたのかもねー
trans:
Maybe it rained just so that
we'll be able to see the rainbow.

name: 咲耶
text: クス……そうだね
trans: Heh... maybe.

name: 摩美々
text:
てゆーかぁ
このてるてる坊主、どうするのー？
trans:
More importantly,
what are we going to do with the Teru Teru Bozu?

name: 結華
text: あはは～。効果抜群だったからねー
trans: Ahaha, it was so effective!

name: 恋鐘
text:
また今度雨が降ったら飾ればよか！
うちらのてるてる坊主なら一瞬で晴れにしてくれるけんね！
trans:
We should put them up when it rains like that again!
Our Teru Teru Bozu will clear the weather immediately!

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
雨の日の……天使さんたちだね……
trans:
Fufu...
They are angels... of rainy days...

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ……そう言われると
なんだか、次の雨の日が待ち遠しくなってしまうね
trans:
Heh... When you put it like that,
it somehow makes me look forward to the next time it rains.
